title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 53.2 - Information required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 53.2 - Information required

State Regulations

The TD-1A form for each particular theatre, stadium, garden, arena or other place
where theatre or sporting events are held shall set forth: (a) the name and address of the theatre, stadium, garden, arena or other place where theatre or sporting events are held; (b) the name and address of the
owner, and the operator or operating lessee thereof; (c) the names, residence addresses, social security
numbers, dates of birth and positions of all persons or firms directly or indirectly controlling the business of the owner, operator or operating
lessee as principals, officers, directors, trustees, controlling shareholders or managing agents; (d) the
names, residence addresses, social security numbers, dates of birth and positions of all other theatre and sporting events personnel, as defined in
article 23 of the Arts and Cultural Affairs Law, including treasurers and assistant treasurers and any other person who has control over the
allocations or distributions of tickets of the theatre, stadium, garden, arena or other places named in the form TD-1A. (e) Further information shall be set forth for any person named on the registration as follows: (1)
if any such person has been convicted of any crime relating to the sale of tickets to theatrical productions or
sporting events, or violations of article 23 of the Arts and Cultural Affairs Law, the details of such convictions shall be set forth including the
date of the conviction, the court where the conviction was obtained and the crime or violation charged; (2)
if any such person has been the subject of an order of the Attorney General cancelling or suspending his name
from a ticket distributor registration or any amendment thereto, pursuant to article 26-A of the General Business Law, or article 23 of the Arts and

Cultural Affairs Law, the details of such order shall be set forth including the date of such order, the theatre, stadium, garden or other place
involved, whether the name was cancelled or suspended; if the person was suspended, the length of suspension. Notes

Amended

New York State Register July 3, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 27, eff. 7/3/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
